name: Plants vs. Zombies: Garden Warfare 2
description: The battle for suburbia grows to crazy new heights in Plants vs. Zombies Garden Warfare 2! For the first time in franchise history, zombies have taken over and plants are on the attack. With new characters, more ways to play and immersive new maps, Plants vs. Zombies Garden Warfare 2 taps into the heart of what fans loved about the original and goes above and beyond to deliver the funniest, craziest, and most over-the-top shooter.
